9. It Follows (2014) - After a sexual encounter, a young woman is haunted by a supernatural entity that takes on different forms and follows her everywhere.
10. The Witch (2015) - In 17th-century New England, a family struggles to survive when their infant son is taken by a witch, leading them into a dark and dangerous world.
